TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi D3DImage extends System.Windows.Media.ImageSource

summary.span: An that displays a user-created Direct3D surface.

span.span: An that displays a user-created Direct3D surface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用類別，以裝載在 Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) 應用程式中的 Direct3D 內容。Use the class to host Direct3D content in a Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) application. 呼叫方法，以變更所顯示的 Direct3D 內容。Call the method to change the Direct3D content displayed by the . 呼叫方法來指派 Direct3D 介面。Call the method to assign a Direct3D surface to a . 呼叫方法來追蹤的 Direct3D 介面的更新。Call the method to track updates to the Direct3D surface. 呼叫方法，以顯示已變更的區域。Call the method to display the changed areas. 類別會管理兩個顯示緩衝區，也就所謂*背景緩衝區*並*前景緩衝區*。The class manages two display buffers, which are called the *back buffer* and the *front buffer*. 背景緩衝區是 Direct3D 介面。The back buffer is your Direct3D surface. 變更背景緩衝區會複製轉寄到前景緩衝區時呼叫方法，它會顯示在硬體。Changes to the back buffer are copied forward to the front buffer when you call the method, where it is displayed on the hardware. 有時候，前景緩衝區變得無法使用。Occasionally, the front buffer becomes unavailable. 缺乏此種可用性可能因螢幕鎖定、 全螢幕專屬 Direct3D 應用程式、 切換使用者，或其他系統活動。This lack of availability can be caused by screen locking, full-screen exclusive Direct3D applications, user-switching, or other system activities. 當發生這種情況時，您的 WPF 應用程式會收到通知，藉由處理事件。When this occurs, your WPF application is notified by handling the event. 到前景緩衝區變得無法使用您的應用程式的回應方式，取決於是否啟用 WPF 回到軟體轉譯。How your application responds to the front buffer becoming unavailable depends on whether WPF is enabled to fall back to software rendering. 方法有多載接受參數，指定是否 WPF 就會回到軟體轉譯。The method has an overload that takes a parameter that specifies whether WPF falls back to software rendering. ## WPF 不會回到軟體轉譯時，無法使用的前景緩衝區以回應Responding to an Unavailable Front Buffer when WPF Does not Fall Back to Software Rendering 當您呼叫多載，或呼叫多載`enableSoftwareFallback`參數設定為`false`，當前景緩衝區變得無法使用，並沒有呈現系統釋出其指向背景緩衝區的參考顯示此項目。When you call the overload or call the overload with the `enableSoftwareFallback` parameter set to `false`, the rendering system releases its reference to the back buffer when the front buffer becomes unavailable and nothing is displayed. 當前景緩衝區再次可用時，轉譯系統就會引發事件以通知您的 WPF 應用程式。When the front buffer is available again, the rendering system raises the event to notify your WPF application. 您可以建立的事件處理常式事件，以重新啟動一次使用有效的 Direct3D 介面的轉譯。You can create an event handler for the event to restart rendering again with a valid Direct3D surface. 若要重新啟動轉譯，您必須呼叫。To restart rendering, you must call . ## 當 WPF 便會回到軟體轉譯回應無法使用的前景緩衝區Responding to an Unavailable Front Buffer when WPF Falls Back to Software Rendering 當您呼叫多載`enableSoftwareFallback`參數設為`true`，呈現系統會保留其指向背景緩衝區的參考，當前景緩衝區變成無法使用，這樣就不需要呼叫時前端緩衝區可供一次。When you call the overload with the `enableSoftwareFallback` parameter set to `true`, the rendering system retains its reference to the back buffer when the front buffer becomes unavailable, so there is no need to call when the front buffer is available again. 可能有一些情況，使用者的裝置變得無法使用。There may be situations where the user’s device becomes unavailable. 當發生此情況時，呼叫釋放背景緩衝區的 WPF 的參考。When that occurs, call to release WPF’s reference to the back buffer. 如果您需要將裝置重設，呼叫具有`backBuffer`參數設為`null`，然後呼叫再`backBuffer`設為有效的 Direct3D 介面。If you need to reset your device, call with the `backBuffer` parameter set to `null`, and then call again with `backBuffer` set to a valid Direct3D surface. > [!NOTE] > 效能大幅取決於 Direct3D 介面的設定。Performance depends greatly on the settings of the Direct3D surface. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [Direct3D9 和 WPF 互通性的效能考量](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/performance-considerations-for-direct3d9-and-wpf-interoperability.md)。For more information, see [Performance Considerations for Direct3D9 and WPF Interoperability](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/performance-considerations-for-direct3d9-and-wpf-interoperability.md). > [!NOTE] > 類別將不會顯示 Direct3D 內容 WPF 軟體中呈現，例如透過遠端桌面連線，除非您呼叫並指定`true`如`enableSoftwareFallback`參數。The class does not display Direct3D content when WPF renders in software, such as over a Remote Desktop connection, unless you call and specify `true` for the `enableSoftwareFallback` parameter. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何宣告在 XAML 中。The following code example shows how to declare a in XAML. 您必須將對應命名空間，因為它不會包含預設 XAML 命名空間中。You must map the namespace, because it is not included in the default XAML namespaces. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 逐步解說： 裝載 Direct3D9 內容在 WPF 中](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-hosting-direct3d9-content-in-wpf.md)。For more information, see [Walkthrough: Hosting Direct3D9 Content in WPF](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-hosting-direct3d9-content-in-wpf.md). [!code-xaml[System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage/CS/window1.xaml#10)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫方法，以表示您的程式碼有指向背景緩衝區所做的變更。Call the method to indicate changes your code has made to the back buffer. 若要呈現，在背景緩衝區上的已變更的區域必須有對應的已變更的區域。To be rendered, the changed area on the back buffer must have a corresponding changed area on the . 呼叫並方法，然後再呼叫方法。Call the and methods before calling the method. 呼叫方法，將已變更的區域複製到前景緩衝區。Call the method to copy the changed areas to the front buffer. > [!NOTE] > 後幾個呼叫方法中，已變更的區域會合併成單一的區域。After a few calls to the method, the changed areas are merged into a single area. 這表示您必須擁有有效的資料已變更區域之外。This means you must have valid data outside of the changed areas. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何呼叫方法，以背景緩衝區中指定的已變更的區域。The following code example shows how to call the method to specify the changed region in the back buffer. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 逐步解說： 裝載 Direct3D9 內容在 WPF 中](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-hosting-direct3d9-content-in-wpf.md)。For more information, see [Walkthrough: Hosting Direct3D9 Content in WPF](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-hosting-direct3d9-content-in-wpf.md). remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會覆寫。This method overrides . 應用程式程式碼不應該呼叫這個方法。物件的`Finalize`方法會自動叫用記憶體回收期間，除非呼叫已停用記憶體回收行程的最終處理方法。Application code should not call this method; an object's `Finalize` method is automatically invoked during garbage collection, unless finalization by the garbage collector has been disabled by a call to the method. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [Finalize 方法和解構函式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fd376774-1643-499b-869e-9546a3aeea70)，[清除 Unmanaged 資源總](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)，並[覆寫 Finalize 方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3)。For more information, see [Finalize Methods and Destructors](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fd376774-1643-499b-869e-9546a3aeea70), [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md), and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有時候，前景緩衝區變得無法使用。Occasionally, the front buffer becomes unavailable. 缺乏此種可用性可能因螢幕鎖定、 全螢幕專屬 Direct3D 應用程式、 切換使用者，或其他系統活動。This lack of availability can be caused by screen locking, full-screen exclusive Direct3D applications, user-switching, or other system activities. 當發生這種情況時，您的 WPF 應用程式會收到通知，藉由處理事件。When this occurs, your WPF application is notified by handling the event. 到前景緩衝區變得無法使用您的應用程式的回應方式，取決於是否啟用 WPF 回到軟體轉譯。How your application responds to the front buffer becoming unavailable depends on whether WPF is enabled to fall back to software rendering. 方法有多載接受參數，指定是否 WPF 就會回到軟體轉譯。The method has an overload that takes a parameter that specifies whether WPF falls back to software rendering. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱中的備註類別。For more information, see the remarks in the class. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None| ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何檢查轉譯組合目標時的屬性。The following code example shows how to check the property when rendering the composition target. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 逐步解說： 裝載 Direct3D9 內容在 WPF 中](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-hosting-direct3d9-content-in-wpf.md)。For more information, see [Walkthrough: Hosting Direct3D9 Content in WPF](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-hosting-direct3d9-content-in-wpf.md). remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫方法，以變更背景緩衝區，藉由呼叫和方法。Call the method to change the back buffer by calling the and methods. 雖然會鎖定，您的應用程式也可以轉譯至指派給背景緩衝區的 Direct3D 介面。While the is locked, your application can also render to the Direct3D surface assigned to the back buffer. > [!NOTE] > 呈現系統會讀取背景緩衝區以更新前景緩衝區時，封鎖方法。The method blocks when the rendering system is reading the back buffer to update the front buffer. 使用方法，以避免無限期地封鎖。Use the method to avoid blocking indefinitely. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何呼叫方法，以啟用背景緩衝區的更新。The following code example shows how to call the method to enable updates to the back buffer. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 逐步解說： 裝載 Direct3D9 內容在 WPF 中](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-hosting-direct3d9-content-in-wpf.md)。For more information, see [Walkthrough: Hosting Direct3D9 Content in WPF](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-hosting-direct3d9-content-in-wpf.md). MemberSignature.Value: public void SetBackBuffer (System.Windows.Interop.D3DResourceType backBufferType, IntPtr backBuffer);
.method public hidebysig instance void SetBackBuffer(valuetype System.Windows.Interop.D3DResourceType backBufferType, native int backBuffer) cil managed
Public Sub SetBackBuffer (backBufferType As D3DResourceType, backBuffer As IntPtr)

span.span: The type of Direct3D surface.
Must be a valid .

param.name: backBuffer
param.span: The Direct3D surface to assign as the back buffer.

span.span: The Direct3D surface to assign as the back buffer.

summary.span: Assigns a Direct3D surface as the source of the back buffer.

span.span: Assigns a Direct3D surface as the source of the back buffer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫指派背景緩衝區的 Direct3D 介面的方法。Call the method to assign a Direct3D surface to the back buffer. > [!NOTE] > 效能大幅取決於 Direct3D 介面的設定。Performance depends greatly on the settings of the Direct3D surface. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [Direct3D9 和 WPF 互通性的效能考量](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/performance-considerations-for-direct3d9-and-wpf-interoperability.md)。For more information, see [Performance Considerations for Direct3D9 and WPF Interoperability](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/performance-considerations-for-direct3d9-and-wpf-interoperability.md). 呼叫多載等同於呼叫多載`enableSoftwareFallback`參數設定為`false`。Calling the overload is identical to calling the overload with the `enableSoftwareFallback` parameter set to `false`. 當您呼叫或致電具有`enableSoftwareFallback`參數設定為`false`，當前景緩衝區變得無法使用，並不會顯示呈現系統釋出其指向背景緩衝區的參考。When you call or call with the `enableSoftwareFallback` parameter set to `false`, the rendering system releases its reference to the back buffer when front buffer becomes unavailable and nothing is displayed. 當前景緩衝區再次可用時，轉譯系統就會引發事件以通知您的 WPF 應用程式。When the front buffer is available again, the rendering system raises the event to notify your WPF application. 您可以建立的事件處理常式事件，以重新啟動一次使用有效的 Direct3D 介面的轉譯。You can create an event handler for the event to restart rendering again with a valid Direct3D surface. 若要重新啟動轉譯，您必須呼叫。To restart rendering, you must call . 下列清單顯示的所需的背景緩衝區設定`IDirect3DSurface9`型別。The following list shows the required back buffer settings for the `IDirect3DSurface9` type. - `D3DFMT_A8R8G8B8` 或 `D3DFMT_X8R8G8B8``D3DFMT_A8R8G8B8` or `D3DFMT_X8R8G8B8` - `D3DUSAGE_RENDERTARGET` - `D3DPOOL_DEFAULT` 允許多重取樣`IDirect3DSurface9Ex`只會呈現。Multisampling is allowed on `IDirect3DSurface9Ex` surfaces only. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何呼叫指派 Direct3D 介面的方法。The following code example shows how to call the method to assign a Direct3D surface. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 逐步解說： 裝載 Direct3D9 內容在 WPF 中](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-hosting-direct3d9-content-in-wpf.md)。For more information, see [Walkthrough: Hosting Direct3D9 Content in WPF](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-hosting-direct3d9-content-in-wpf.md). [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage/CS/window1.xaml.cs#3)]

span.span: The type of Direct3D surface.
Must be a valid .

param.span: to fall back on software rendering; otherwise, .

summary.span: Assigns a Direct3D surface as the source of the back buffer.

span.span: Assigns a Direct3D surface as the source of the back buffer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您呼叫多載，或呼叫多載`enableSoftwareFallback`參數設定為`false`，當前景緩衝區變得無法使用，並沒有呈現系統釋出其指向背景緩衝區的參考顯示此項目。When you call the overload or call the overload with the `enableSoftwareFallback` parameter set to `false`, the rendering system releases its reference to the back buffer when the front buffer becomes unavailable and nothing is displayed. 當前景緩衝區再次可用時，轉譯系統就會引發事件以通知您的 WPF 應用程式。When the front buffer is available again, the rendering system raises the event to notify your WPF application. 您可以建立的事件處理常式事件，以重新啟動一次使用有效的 Direct3D 介面的轉譯。You can create an event handler for the event to restart rendering again with a valid Direct3D surface. 若要重新啟動轉譯，您必須呼叫。To restart rendering, you must call . 當您呼叫具有`enableSoftwareFallback`參數設為`true`，呈現系統會保留其指向背景緩衝區的參考，當前景緩衝區變成無法使用，這樣就不需要呼叫前景緩衝區時可以使用一次。When you call with the `enableSoftwareFallback` parameter set to `true`, the rendering system retains its reference to the back buffer when the front buffer becomes unavailable, so there is no need to call when the front buffer is available again. 可能有一些情況，使用者的裝置變得無法使用。There may be situations where the user’s device becomes unavailable. 當發生此情況時，呼叫釋放背景緩衝區的 WPF 的參考。When that occurs, call to release WPF’s reference to the back buffer. 如果您需要將裝置重設，呼叫具有`backBuffer`設為`null`，然後呼叫再`backBuffer`設為有效的 Direct3D 介面。If you need to reset your device, call with `backBuffer` set to `null`, and then call again with `backBuffer` set to a valid Direct3D surface. 下列清單顯示的所需的背景緩衝區設定`IDirect3DSurface9`型別。The following list shows the required back buffer settings for the `IDirect3DSurface9` type. - `D3DFMT_A8R8G8B8` 或 `D3DFMT_X8R8G8B8``D3DFMT_A8R8G8B8` or `D3DFMT_X8R8G8B8` - `D3DUSAGE_RENDERTARGET` - `D3DPOOL_DEFAULT` 允許多重取樣`IDirect3DSurface9Ex`只會呈現。Multisampling is allowed on `IDirect3DSurface9Ex` surfaces only.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Unlock() cil managed

summary.span: Decrements the lock count for the .

span.span: Decrements the lock count for the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當的鎖定計數到達零時，已完全解除鎖定。When the lock count for the reaches zero, the is fully unlocked. 標記來呈現如果映像已由先前呼叫所指定的區域方法。The is marked for rendering if the image has changed areas that were specified by previous calls to the method. 當變更都會認可且發生轉譯、 額外的呼叫來方法區塊，直到轉譯執行緒已複製到前景緩衝區的背景緩衝區的內容。When the changes are committed and rendering occurs, additional calls to the method block until the render thread has copied the contents of the back buffer to the front buffer. 這項同步處理可避免顯示成品，例如撕裂。This synchronization avoids display artifacts, such as tearing. > [!NOTE] > 不會進行更新時的 Direct3D 介面已解除鎖定。Do not update the Direct3D surface while the is unlocked. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何呼叫方法，將更新的背景緩衝區複製到前景緩衝區。The following code example shows how to call the method to copy the updated back buffer to the front buffer. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 逐步解說： 裝載 Direct3D9 內容在 WPF 中](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-hosting-direct3d9-content-in-wpf.md)。For more information, see [Walkthrough: Hosting Direct3D9 Content in WPF](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/walkthrough-hosting-direct3d9-content-in-wpf.md). [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/System.Windows.Interop.D3DImage/CS/window1.xaml.cs#3)]
